entries.meaning: (furniture) A table containing a basin and a pitcher of water for washing
(dated) In a stable or garage, a place in the floor prepared so that carriages or automobiles may be washed there and the water run off.
examples: Washstand in an Electric Garage.  […]  In a few garages arrangements are made for washing cars in any position on the storage floor, so that it is not necessary to move them on to and off the washrack.
